SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.areas

Class BaseRoom

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.areas.BaseRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
EnemyRoom, GambleRoom, ShopRoom
public abstract class BaseRoom extends Object implements Room
Abstract base class for implementing rooms in the game. This class provides common functionality for all room types.

      collectibleFactory - The factory for creating collectible items.
      roomConnections - List of room connections.
      specification - The room specification string.

      wallThickness - The thickness of the walls.
